I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I love discovering new things about myself!
i have shot a lion.

participant_2.background:
I'm catching up on my reading this weekend.
I listen to music to escape from my world for a little while.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Hey! I'm reading. What about you?
I'm doing laundry. I like to do it on the weekend when I have more time.
That makes sense! I'm not a morning person, so I like to do my reading in the morning when it's quiet.
I'm not a morning person either, but I love having the house to myself in the morning.
Me too! I like to have my coffee and read the news.
That sounds nice! I like to draw in the morning. I find it helps me relax.
I love drawing too! I wish I had more time to do it.
Well, maybe we can draw together sometime?
That would be fun! I'd love to learn some new techniques.
Great! I'll message you my number.
